sentences.sentence: First he had been numb. Then the numbness gave way to anger.
sentences.translation: 一开始他只是麻木。后来麻木被愤怒代替。

sentences.sentence: Many men become more aware of emotional numbness in their 40s.
sentences.translation: 很多男性四十多岁时愈发意识到自己情感上的麻木。

sentences.sentence: I have recently been suffering from pain and numbness in my hands.
sentences.translation: 近来我双手一直疼痛、麻木。
